metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Wall and near HAG SurvivorsNOTE please rename NPC to Courier Hara - being scanned by Steel Watcher

0.speaker: Courier Hara
0.text: Why are we standing here if that thing is broken? This is ridiculous.

1.speaker: Courier Hara
1.text: I wish we could get this over with. If I don't make my deliveries, I don't get paid.
